meanings.sent1: She carefully dewaxes the surfboard before heading to the beach.
meanings.sent2: The carwash dewaxes the vehicles to make them shine.
meanings.sent3: The candle maker accidentally dewaxes their own hands instead of the candles.
meanings.sent4: The cleaner dewaxes the floor, revealing its true color and shine.
meanings.sent5: After she dewaxes the furniture, it looks brand new and glossy.

meanings.sent1: He dewaxes the old furniture to restore its original beauty.
meanings.sent2: The spa treatment dewaxes the skin for a smooth feel.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly dewaxes the cheese, making it less flavorful.
meanings.sent4: The artist dewaxes the sculpture, revealing intricate details.
meanings.sent5: The technician dewaxes the skis for better performance on the slopes.
